name: dark-souls-notifications
description: Dark Souls You Died styled notification system

scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.css" dist && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.html" dist && copyfiles -u 0 "assets/**/*" dist
scripts.watch-assets: nodemon --watch src --watch assets --ext css,html,mp3,ttf,png --exec "npm run copy-assets"
